Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:盈

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+76C8

Main pronunciation 主要发音: yíng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning full.

English senses 英语理解: fill; full, overflowing; surplus

Usage example 用法举例: 盈餘 yíng yú (surplus)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1938

Shuowen 说文解字: 滿器也從皿夃臣鉉等曰夃益多之義也古者以買物多得為夃故從夃

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 盈 mutant 盁 from bowl 皿 mǐn and related phonetic success 夃𡕔 yíng name- full 盈 yíng.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- see 孕包夃𡕔盈盁尕 related to pregnancy-full-success)

盁字的基本解释

盁
yíng
古同“盈”，满。

盁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《廣韻》以成切，平清，以。］
亦作“溋1”。亦作“盁1”。“逞2”的被通假字。
(1)满，充满。
(2)足够；满足。
(3)丰满；饱满。
(4)圆满，无残缺。
(5)盛，旺盛。
(6)长；增加。
(7)众多。
(8)超过。
(9)溢出；上涨。
(10)极；过分。
(11)骄傲，自满。
(12)见“盈盈”。
(13)姓。

盁字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【午集】【皿字部】　盁； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页792第35
【字彙補】《漢靈臺?》盈字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yíng］
["Guangyun" is cut, calm and clear, with. ]
Also known as "溋1". Also known as "盁1". The false word for "逞2" was passed.
(1) Full, full.
(2) Sufficient; satisfied.
(3) Fullness; fullness.
(4) Consummation and no defects.
(5) Sheng, exuberant.
(6) Long; increase.
(7) Numerous.
(8) Exceed.
(9) Overflow; rising.
(10) Extremely; excessive.
(11) Pride and complacency.
(12) See "Yingying".
(13) Last name.
